events.name: PostCreated
events.description: A new post is created to showcase food products at EFI.

events.name: PostUpdated
events.description: An existing post is modified for accuracy or updated product information.

events.name: PostDeleted
events.description: A post is removed from the system, no longer showcased.

events.name: PostPublished
events.description: Post is published and visible to customers.

events.name: PostUnpublished
events.description: Post is unpublished and hidden from customers.

commands.name: CreatePost
commands.description: A new post is created to showcase food products at EFI.

commands.name: UpdatePost
commands.description: An existing post is modified for accuracy or updated product information.

commands.name: DeletePost
commands.description: A post is removed from the system, no longer showcased.

commands.name: PublishPost
commands.description: Post is published and visible to customers.

commands.name: UnpublishPost
commands.description: Post is unpublished and hidden from customers.

integrationPoints.name: UserManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with user management for post author details.

integrationPoints.name: ProductCatalog
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with product catalog to showcase products in posts.

integrationPoints.name: Analytics
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with analytics to track post engagement and performance.
